title: Tomba Clearbit-Company Actor Input
description: Input schema for the Tomba Clearbit-Company Actor that enriches company information using the Tomba API based on domain names.

tombaApiKey.title: Tomba API Key
tombaApiKey.description: Your Tomba API key (ta_xxxx). Get it from https://app.tomba.io/api

tombaApiSecret.title: Tomba Secret Key
tombaApiSecret.description: Your Tomba secret key (ts_xxxx). Get it from https://app.tomba.io/api

domains.title: Domains to Enrich
domains.description: Array of domain names to enrich with company information.

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of companies to enrich. Default is 50.
